name: Can you do it?
description:
A game which will trick your mind into thinking in what you did wrong, so have to make your move carefully

It is built upon all three of the themes, the game should make total sense but looks can also be deceiving cause it is not supposed to do that

if you did something which you are not supposed to do Press R to restart,

SORRY YOU HAVE TO PLAY THE GAME FROM THE FIRST LEVEL AGAIN

Controls-

W & D to move

F to fire

SPACE to Jump

R to Reload
